vulnerabilities.title: Denial of service in Valine
vulnerabilities.description: Valine is a fast, simple & powerful comment system. Valine 1.4.14 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application outage) by supplying a ua (aka User-Agent) value that only specifies the product and version.

vulnerabilities.title: Valine code injection vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Valine was discovered to contain a remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability which allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted POST request.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross site scripting in valine
vulnerabilities.description: valine is a fast, simple & powerful comment system. Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in xCss Valine v1.4.14 via the nick parameter to /classes/Comment. A fix was released in version 1.4.15.
